skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer - Spence, Hull Number DD-512!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm... Spence from the Little Beavers. I took part in the Great Marianas Turkey Shoot with my younger sisters. Oh no! A h-h-hurricane is coming... Sorry, Commander, I forget everything when I get nervous!
skins.acquisition: Huh...? C-C-C-Commander... Hello... Spence h-has been wanting to talk to you... b-but didn't have the courage to...
skins.login: C-Commander... N-no, I wasn't waiting that long!
skins.details: Ah! D-don't touch me anywhere weird, okay...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, it's so warm here! I think I can relax like this...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Thatcher's over there! She's making me anxious~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ausburne isn't like Thatcher at all... She actually helps me when I need it!
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm sorry that I don't live up to your expectations, Commander...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eeek~! Um... W-what am I supposed to...
